attributes.action: GIVE HARDER PUNISHMENT FOR PEOPLE CAUGHT WITH AND USING KNIVES!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the people of the uk are sick and tired of the "knife crime" that is enveloping our country!

The goverment has to act now before we lose more people to needless knife crime. 

We want longer sentences and harsher punishment for people who are caught with knives, using knives and harming and KILLING by knives!! This "knife society" that has been created has got to stop!!

We need more police on the streets, more spot checks,  NO MORE KNIFE DEATHS

rejection.details: There are other similar petitions, see http://search.petitions.pm.gov.uk/kbroker/number10/petitions/search.lsim?qt=knife+crime&sr=0&nh=10&cs=&sc=number10&oq=tough+knife&sb=0&ha=1157&mt=0
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
